Posts.Content: Hi Rebecca, I had the same feeling when I was washing my hair when it was growing back in and bring my hair forward and when I looked up I could see the end of my hair  it's such a good feeling when things get back to "normal" no weekly visits to whatever specialist appointment you have, I still have some side effects but fatigue is the worst  i had long hair before diagnosis but have decided to keep shortish as I have hot flushes from Tamoxifen and don't want to tie my hair back, but in 9yrs time I'll be 54 and might start to grow it long  take care  x
Posts.Title: Brushing my teeth

Posts.Content: Hi Mrs Shep Rad was pretty uneventful for me (25 seesions) I only had a tiny rad burn and a cooling patch called Intrasite Conformable helped and it was my sister at my doctors who got them specially for me  it was the radiation infection I got after everything was done but you're radiation team will go over that with you as not everybody is affected take care  x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy Here I come
